sentence.Network_en: Last year's cotton crop was an unmitigated disaster.
sentence.Network_cn: 去年棉花作物所遭遇的是彻头彻尾的灾难。

sentence.Network_en: The evening was an unmitigated disaster.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一晚完全是一场灾难。

sentence.Network_en: The conference begins this week against a backdrop of unmitigated gloom.
sentence.Network_cn: 会议这个星期在一片愁云惨雾中开始.

PerfectNetExp.abs: -unmitigated 绝对的，十足的， 不缓和的-
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... unmistakably 明白地 unmitigated 未缓和的 unmixed 纯粹的.
tem8&nbsp;words&nbsp;and&nbsp;expressi... ... 2.settle accounts: 清算 3.unmitigated: 十足的，彻底的 4.nuisance: 讨厌的东西.
... 9. Of superlative strength or efficacy: 极有效的或有力量的： 10. Unmitigated: 纯粹的： a sovereign state. 主权国家.

list.abs: unmitigated suffering ; unmitigated horror ; unmitigated lie ., 十足的痛苦 ; 十足的恐惧 ; 十足的谎言.
so perhaps our political obsession with the next by-election results is not an unmitigated boon .所以，我们对于下一轮补缺选举的结果产生的政治迷惑或许也不是什么好事。
unmitigated suffering ; unmitigated horror ; unmitigated lie ., 十足的痛苦 ; 十足的恐惧 ; 十足的谎言.
unloading cement 水泥起卸unmitigated noise 未经减低的噪音unpolluted water 没有污染的水

entry.tran: （坏事情）完全的，十足的，彻底的
entry.def: You use unmitigated to emphasize that a bad situation or quality is totally bad.

example.ex: Last year's cotton crop was an unmitigated disaster...
example.tran: 去年棉花作物所遭遇的是彻头彻尾的灾难。

example.ex: She leads a life of unmitigated misery.
example.tran: 她过着极度痛苦的生活。

means.word_mean: 1. not diminished or moderated in intensity or severity; sometimes used as an intensifier;

auth_sentence.content: What is in fact occurring is almost unmitigated progress!
auth_sentence.res_content: What is in fact occurring is almost unmitigated progress!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What is in fact occurring is almost unmitigated progress!

auth_sentence.content: None of this makes That Lucky Old Sun an unmitigated disaster.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: None of this makes That Lucky Old Sun an unmitigated disaster.

auth_sentence.content: Relentlessness is not always an unmitigated blessing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Relentlessness is not always an unmitigated blessing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Relentlessness is not always an unmitigated blessing.
